mapper.select: select no,room,send_nick,recv_nick, date_format(send_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as send_time, read_time,content,read_chk from t_ms where no in(select max(no) from t_ms group by room) and (send_nick =#{nick} or recv_nick = #{nick}) order by no desc;
select count(no) from t_ms where recv_nick=#{nick} and read_chk=0 and room=#{room}
select count(no) from t_ms where (recv_nick = #{recv_nick} and send_nick=#{send_nick} or (send_nick=#{recv_nick}))
select room from t_ms where (recv_nick = #{recv_nick} and send_nick=#{send_nick}) or (send_nick=#{recv_ncik} and recv_nick=#{send_nick}) limit 0,1
